mutants.code:
def calculate_hexagonal_tiles(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    sorted_sides = sorted([a, b, c])
    (a_sorted, b_sorted, c_sorted) = sorted_sides
    total_tiles = (b_sorted + a_sorted - 1) * (c_sorted + a_sorted - 1) + (a_sorted - 1) * a_sorted
    return total_tiles

def calculate_hexagonal_tiles(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    sorted_sides = sorted([a, b, c])
    (a_sorted, b_sorted, c_sorted) = sorted_sides
    total_tiles = (b_sorted + a_sorted - 1) * (c_sorted + a_sorted - 1) * ((a_sorted - 1) * a_sorted)
    return total_tiles

def calculate_hexagonal_tiles(a: int, b: int, c: int) -> int:
    sorted_sides = sorted([a, b, c])
    (a_sorted, b_sorted, c_sorted) = sorted_sides
    total_tiles = (b_sorted + a_sorted - 1) / (c_sorted + a_sorted - 1) - (a_sorted - 1) * a_sorted
    return total_tiles
